name: Carl Sven Axel Lagerberg
obverse: Bust of Carl Sven Axel Lagerberg facing left. He is wearing the insignia of the Royal Order of the Seraphim.
reverse: Inscription around edge and three lines at top. In the center are two military batons crossed over each other and held together by a ribbon. Behind the batons is a branch.
description: Sven Lagerberg was a Swedish general.
He became a lieutenant in 1839. This medal commemorates the 50th anniversary of that appointment.
